name: Throw The Hand Grenade - kaboom - ready for release
name_original: Throw The Hand Grenade - kaboom - ready for release
description:
This project is fully functional game. Game is ready for release.
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
Gameplay is very simple just use your finger to swing and throw the grenade as far as you can. This is complete project pack and it is ready for release. Mobile ready. Easy to reskin.
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
I hope you will like this template and please check out my other projects.
